exhibition_title: The Artful Animal: 500 Years of Beasts, Birds, and Other Earthly Creatures
exhibition_description: Drawn primarily from the MIAâ€™s permanent collection, this inter-departmental exhibition examined the theme of the animal in art from the 16th century to the present. Approximately 80 prints, drawings, watercolors, paintings, sculptures, books, and decorative objects, which depict mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians, fish, insects, and imaginary creatures, were featured.
